name: publish-artifact

inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the ElectricFlow end point to use.
inputs.name: electricFlowService
inputs.label: ElectricFlow service endpoint
Artifact Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Location or path for the artifact files to be published to ElectricFlow. E.g., $(Build.BuildNumber)/target/artifact.war
inputs.name: artifactPath

inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the application artifact using the format <group_id>:<artifact_key>. E.g., "com.example:helloworld"
inputs.name: artifactName
inputs.label: Artifact Name

inputs.name: artifactVersion
inputs.helpMarkDown: Version of the application artifact. E.g., you can specify 1.0 or 1.0-$BUILD_TAG that is based on Jenkins environment variable
inputs.label: Artifact Version

description: This integration allows you to publish artifact for your application to ElectricFlow.
author: Electric Cloud
